results.title: [MooreToCore] Support for StringType from moore to llvm dialect
results.relevance_notes: Directly discusses StringType support in MooreToCore. Same root cause - missing StringType converter.

results.title: [ImportVerilog] Cannot compile forward declared string type
results.relevance_notes: Reports string type compilation failure in MooreToCore. Same underlying issue - lack of string type conversion.

results.title: [MooreToCore] VariableOp lowered failed
results.relevance_notes: Similar crash pattern in MooreToCore with type conversion failure. Different trigger (struct type vs string type).

results.title: [MooreToCore] Crash with sqrt/floor
results.relevance_notes: Same assertion message 'dyn_cast on a non-existent value'. Different trigger (real type conversion).

results.title: [ESI] Assertion: dyn_cast on a non-existent value
results.relevance_notes: Same assertion but in ESI dialect, not Moore. Different root cause.

results.title: [MooreToCore] Support for Unsized Array Type
results.relevance_notes: Related feature request for type support in MooreToCore. Different type (unsized array).

analysis_summary: Issue #8332 is highly related - it directly discusses adding StringType support to MooreToCore. Issue #8283 is also very relevant, reporting the same underlying problem. The current crash is likely a manifestation of the known missing StringType converter.
